meanings.definition: A small wild cat native to Central and South America.
meanings.sent1: The margay is a clever hunter in the rainforest.
meanings.sent2: I saw a margay climbing a tree in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The margay tried to play hide-and-seek with the monkeys.
meanings.sent4: Her agility on the dance floor was like that of a margay in the trees.
meanings.sent5: The margay's spotted coat helps it blend in with the foliage.

meanings.definition: The fur of this cat, often used in clothing and accessories.
meanings.sent1: She wore a luxurious coat made of margay fur.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer showcased a stunning margay fur stole.
meanings.sent3: The margay fur hat kept her head warm in the winter.
meanings.sent4: The margay fur trim added elegance to the evening gown.
meanings.sent5: The softness of margay fur is unmatched in the industry.
